channel.title: Need help 508 cleint connecting to other servers
channel.description:
ok i got my 508 client...
umairscape ip changer
and my friend has the server open and hes on it
i open the folder click run then i enter the ip
then it loads but it stops at connecting to update server
what do i do? or what does my friend have to do get me to connect???

item.title: Need help 508 cleint connecting to other servers
item.dc:creator: @boomer4456 boomer4456
item.description:
@boomer4456 wrote:

hmm. maybe the cache has something to do even though you have it cuz it loads up…

Read full topic
